name: Dark Vision
desc: You can see in the dark.

name: Cure Ailment
desc: Your body is being cleansed of diseases and parasites.
apply_message: Your body is being cleansed of diseases and parasites.
remove_message: Your body has finished cleansing itself of diseases and parasites.

name: Elemental Climate Control
apply_message: Your whole body feels comfortable no matter how many layers you wear.
remove_message: Your body once again feels outside temperature.

name: Prayer: Temperature Protection
desc: You are being protected from extreme temperatures. Don't try your luck against a volcano.
apply_message: You feel reassured knowing an external presence is watching over you.
remove_message: Your prayer has run out. Blizzards and volcanoes will to hurt a lot.

name: Prayer: Strength
desc: You are being granted extra strength.
apply_message: You feel reassured knowing an external presence is watching over you.
remove_message: Your prayer has run out. You're weaker.

name: Prayer: Dexterity
desc: You are being granted extra dexterity.
apply_message: You feel reassured knowing an external presence is watching over you.
remove_message: Your prayer has run out. You're less dexterous.

name: Prayer: Perception
desc: You are being granted extra perception.
apply_message: You feel reassured knowing an external presence is watching over you.
remove_message: Your prayer has run out. You don't see things as well.

name: Prayer: Intelligence
desc: You are being granted extra intelligence.
apply_message: You feel reassured knowing an external presence is watching over you.
remove_message: Your prayer has run out. You're dumber.

name: Prayer: Speed
desc: You are being granted extra speed.
apply_message: You feel reassured knowing an external presence is watching over you.
remove_message: Your prayer has run out. You're slower.

name: Radiation protection
apply_message: You feel nothing, but you're sure radiation won't bother you.
remove_message: You feel nothing, but you think radiation will bother you again.

name: Glare protection
apply_message: Your eyes aren't bothered by light.
remove_message: Your eyes are bothered by light again.

name: Sound protection
apply_message: Your ears aren't bothered by sound.
remove_message: Your ears are bothered by sound again.

name: Gas protection
apply_message: You feel nothing, but you're sure dangerous gases won't bother you.
remove_message: You feel nothing, but you think dangerous gases will bother you again.

name: Awakening Sickness
desc: Awakening your magical potential this way was a terrible idea. You can tell you'll be incapacitated a full week. It will not get better until it's completely out of your system.
apply_message: An entire record of human history flashes before your eyes in seconds, overwhelming your mind with overwhelming counts of atrocities and suffering. Your body rejects the changes and is in constant agony. You begin to understand magic, psionics, and lost human history.
remove_message: Your body has manifested newfound powers, you now have an essence-based soul linked to your body. Should your body perish your soul will live on. You understand your newfound powers.
